Pre-reqs: (6 credits of 200-level VISA with an average of at least 72%.)
This performance art studio class will consider major Canadian and international performance art works and ideas about "spectator, public and community." Group and solo performance exercises and assignments. Weekly discussions of text, viewing works, exercises in class and outdoors. Guest speakers and workshop leaders. Possible field trip if performances happening in Vancouver. Open to all students.
